page.title: 08Home Life in Stallingborough
page.content: There is great diversity in family groups ranging from young married couples, couples with children (on average 2) and elderly couples. A wide range of household appliances is available to housewives. This means many have a part time job as well as looking after the home and family. There are a great many convenience foods available, many bought in bulk and stored in a home freezer. With the recent development of the Microwave Cooker, food can be cooked in a matter of minutes. Household services ie. gas, electricity and water have built in safety devices to reduce the risk of accidents. A number of households have a range of domestic pets most popular being cats and dogs.
